description.value: You can make this carpet hover and fly by taking a Magic|XPHB action and using the carpet's command word. It moves according to your directions if you are within 30 feet of it. A 3 ft. × 5 ft. carpet can carry up to 200 lb. at a fly speed of 80 feet. A carpet can carry up to twice the weight shown on the table, but its Fly Speed|XPHB is halved if it carries more than its normal capacity.

_srdData.name: Carpet of Flying, 3 ft. × 5 ft.
entries: You can make this carpet hover and fly by taking a {@action Magic|XPHB} action and using the carpet's command word. It moves according to your directions if you are within 30 feet of it.

A 3 ft. × 5 ft. carpet can carry up to 200 lb. at a fly speed of 80 feet. A carpet can carry up to twice the weight shown on the table, but its {@variantrule Fly Speed|XPHB} is halved if it carries more than its normal capacity.
